Welcome to the
Hardin County Clerk's Office

div.p: The Hardin County Clerk’s Office provides many services to the people of Hardin County. Whether it is recording deeds, mortgages and other legal documents, or vehicle transactions and registrations; we are here to serve the public in a friendly and efficient manner. This site will provide you with information about: doing genealogical research, real estate recordings, marriage licenses, election information, delinquent tax information and many things concerning vehicle registration.
